video.headline: Joseph Morales kicks off UFC 319 with a submission victory
video.caption: Joseph Morales gets Alibi Idiris to tap out from a triangle hold.
video.title: Joseph Morales kicks off UFC 319 with a submission victory
video.description: Joseph Morales gets Alibi Idiris to tap out from a triangle hold.

video.headline: Alexander Hernandez KO's Chase Hooper right before Round 1 ends
video.caption: Alexander Hernandez drops Chase Hooper with a vicious right hand for the knockout.
video.title: Alexander Hernandez KO's Chase Hooper right before Round 1 ends
video.description: Alexander Hernandez drops Chase Hooper with a vicious right hand for the knockout.

video.headline: Michal Oleksiejczuk finishes Gerald Meerschaert in the 1st round
video.caption: Michal Oleksiejczuk drops Gerald Meerschaert with a left hook, then dominates him on the ground for the knockout.
video.title: Michal Oleksiejczuk finishes Gerald Meerschaert in the 1st round

video.headline: Baisangur Susurkaev improves to 9-0 after a 2nd round submission
video.caption: Baysangur Susurkaev locks in the rear-naked chokehold on Eric Nolan to remain undefeated.
video.title: Baisangur Susurkaev improves to 9-0 after a 2nd round submission

video.headline: Khamzat Chimaev dominates Dricus Du Plessis to become UFC middleweight champion
video.caption: Khamzat Chimaev completely controls the fight against Dricus Du Plessis and becomes middleweight champion at UFC 319.
